categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: Drop Point: Laertos was an Alliance storage cache located in maintenance storage locker 13A1 in Docking bay 5662 at Laertos Spaceport. The drop point was established to support Operation Nighthook and contained four blaster pistols, two hold-out blasters, four medpacs, four blank starport maintenance coveralls and IDs, two vibroknives, and two hundred credits. Once emptied, the drop point was not intended to be refilled.
